posts.postText:
1) Which server:Jailbreak

2) Offender's name:[OGG]QWACK

3) Offender's SteamID:STEAM_0:0:34177256

4) Explain the situation in detail: Just some blatant racism. (As you'll see in the screenshot, there was another user using racial slurs, but his RP name was appearing and I didn't know how to retrieve their Steam name through their RP name.)

5) Were any specific server rules broken: Rule 6

6) Any staff members on the server at the time of the offence: No.

7) Proof:
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/Qwak1a.jpg
